title: Tapioca bubble tea and hojicha collaboration drink
text:
TP TEA, a takeout shop for tapioca drinks, operated by Chun Shui Tang, the brand that started the original bubble tea trend, is adding the new flavor of hojicha to their collection.

Two new items, Tapioca Hojicha Latte and Tapioca Hojicha Soft Cream will be sold for a limited time exclusively in Japan. Hojicha, or roasted green tea, is on the rise and hojicha flavored sweets are everywhere these days.

TP TEA’s new attempt is an interesting combination of the fragrant taste of traditional Japanese tea and the sweetness of Taiwanese bubble tea.

Tapioca Hojicha Latte costs 650 yen (ice/hot).

Tapioca Hojicha Soft Cream costs 550 yen (cone)/530 yen (cup).
